title: Are there any discord bots that let you get feeds from social media sites? - Quora

response.answer_text: Believe it or not, you don’t actually need a discord bot to achieve this. To get a specific feed from a social media site you can use something called a webhook. Let’s use someone’s twitter account as an example. If you would like to get updated on every tweet an account makes you can use webhooks to post those tweets directly to a specified channel. It is not super hard to do and I would be happy to help you set it up if you run into issues but here is a good tutorial for setting up webhooks. Simple Webhook Tutorial (Twitter -> Discord)
